# Consensus Sleep Diary (CSD) — Official Form Access

The official Consensus Sleep Diary is **free for not‑for‑profit use** when unaltered and properly cited.

To stay compliant, this repository does **not** reproduce the diary form. Instead, download and use the official form from the CSD project site.

**Official form and citation:**

```text
https://consensussleepdiary.com/
```

**Use requirements (summary):**
- The diary is free for not‑for‑profit use.
- The form must not be modified.
- The required citation must be included in any use.

See the site above for the exact wording and PDF.
